articles.author: Moohita Kaur Garg
articles.title: Defending Earth: Repurposing telecommunication satellites to protect Earth from asteroid collision - WION
articles.description: A recent study conducted by the European aerospace company Airbus suggests that when an asteroid is hurtling toward our planets, we could deploy large TV broadcasting satellites to deflect the space rock.

articles.title: Hoeness taunts Kroos: He's got no place in today's football - MARCA.com
articles.description:
Bayern Munich honorary president Uli Hoeness has given his analysis of Germany's performance in the European Championship this summer, and has hit out at Toni Kroos.

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: UK sold off US$42b of semicon firms before review - The Star Online
articles.description: LONDON: The U.K. was once the leading semiconductor innovator in Europe, producing the likes of Arm Ltd., whose technology is found in 90% of all mobile devices, and Imagination Technologies Group Ltd., which supplies chip designs used by Apple Inc.
